name: Cave Crawler (itch) (li0nleo)
description:
Trapped in an infinite cave system, you must fight to survive by casting spells; use fire spells to defend against ice demons and ice spells to fight off fire demons.

As you fight you will deplete your supply of spells, In order to continue you must mine green gems so that you can buy more in the shop!

However, you cannot focus too much on fighting and mining gems as if you stand still for too long, hell will slowly takeover the land beneath your feet, slowly killing you.

The more demons you kill and gems you mine the higher your XP will become. This will eventually progress you up a level increasing the amount of demons that spawn and the rate in which the demons spawn.

This game was developed for my Web Game Development Module at University, hope you enjoy it!!
